Now, putting all the code together. Putting all together:

Start with

program atcoder_ABC070_B

implicit none

integer :: a, b, c, d

integer :: l(4), temp, i, j

read(*,*) a, b, c, d

 if (c > b ) then

    write(*,*) 0

 else if (a >d) then

    write(*,*)0

 else if (a < c) then

    write(*,*) min(b, d) - c

 else

    l(1)=a; l(2)=b; l(3)=c ; l(4)=d

    ! sort l in ascending order

    do i=1,3

       do j=1,4 -i

          if (l(j) > l(j+1) ) then

             temp = l(j)

             l(j) = l(j+1)

             l(j+1) = temp

          end if

       end do

    end do

    write(*,*) l(3) - l(2)

 end if

end program. Wait but I need to loop through j correctly in the nested loop. Let me structure it properly:

The bubble sort loop is:

 do i=1, 3  ! 3 passes for 4 elements

     do j=1, 4 - i

        if (l(j) > l(j+1)) then

            swap them

        end if

     end do

 end do

Yes; so in the j loop, for each i, the inner loop runs from j=1 to 4 - i, and in each iteration, compare j and j+1.

implicit none
